mapper.select: SELECT daikoudb.login_account.account_id, daikoudb.login_account.password,daikoudb.login_account.account_lock, daikoudb.login_account.account_expiration_date,daikoudb.login_account.password_expiration_date, daikoudb.login_account.create_date,daikoudb.login_account.update_date,daikoudb.roles.role_name FROM daikoudb.login_account inner join daikoudb.user_roles on daikoudb.login_account.account_id = daikoudb.user_roles.account_id inner join daikoudb.roles on daikoudb.roles.role_id = daikoudb.user_roles.role_id WHERE daikoudb.login_account.account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daikoudb.login_account (account_id, password, post_code, address, phone, sex, icon_image, update_date, create_date, account_lock, account_expiration_date, password_expiration_date) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{password}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{iconImage, jdbcType=BLOB}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{accountLock}, #{accountExpirationDate}, #{passwordExpirationDate})
